attributes.action: order the replacement of the Olympic logo with a more suitable logo, and fire the person or people who accepted it and allowed money to be paid for the work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo is childish and fails to communicate anything about London, the Olympics, or the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
